text: Thomas Joseph Madden (July 31, 1883 – July 26, 1930) was a Major League Baseball outfielder. Madden played in four games for the Boston Beaneaters in the season, and for the New York Highlanders in . In five career games, he had four hits in 16 at-bats. He was born in and died in Philadelphia ==External links== Category:1883 births Category:1930 deaths Category:Baseball players from Pennsylvania Category:Boston Beaneaters players Category:New York Highlanders players Category:Haverhill Hustlers players Category:Utica Pent- Ups players Category:Montreal Royals players Category:San Francisco Seals (baseball) players Category:Sacramento Sacts players
title: Tommy Madden
